author: oloveridgegreene
title: We reveal a nurse at a top hospital is an ex-porn star who starred in 23 X-rated films during his training
text:
Opinion NAUGHTY BUT NURSE We reveal a nurse at a top hospital is an ex-porn star who starred in 23 X-rated films during his training 
Nurse Timonthy Merrey performed under alter-ego Drake Law when starring in adult films Exclusive Comments A NURSE at a leading hospital is an ex-porn star who starred in 23 X-rated films. 
Timothy Merrey, 23, who used the name Drake Law, appeared in movies such as Swim Team, Doubled Up and Tent Hopping Sluts. 9 Former porn star Timothy Merrey appeared in a number of X-rated flicks 
Two of his films, Kinky F 3 and Perverted Twinks, were released last February as he came to the end of his nurse training. 
He has now got a job in the haematology department at St James’s Hospital in Leeds. 
A source said: “No one at the hospital knew of his background. He’s only just got the job. He is believed to have starred in 23 X-rated films
